about-me.headline: About me
about-me.description: Hello! I'm a frontend developer from the Stendal region, fascinated by the possibilities of IT. My passion is developing engaging and intuitive websites and apps. I work flexibly â€“ whether on-site in Stendal or remotely. I see challenges as an opportunity to learn and expand my skills. For me, code is creative problem-solving to turn your visions into reality.
about-me.tagline: Let's connect and create something amazing together

my-skills.headline: Core Competencies
my-skills.description: In my projects, I have utilized a diverse range of front-end technologies. My experience includes creating static and dynamic websites, implementing responsive layouts, developing user-friendly and interactive user interfaces, and presenting data through engaging visualization tools.

popUp.headline: Don't see the skill you are looking for?
popUp.description: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge. Also I have a special interest in learning:

portfolio.headline: My work
portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

dabubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
dabubble.popup: My main responsibility in the 'dabubble' project was the development of a secure and robust user management system. To achieve this, I integrated Firebase Authentication to implement the registration, login, and password reset functionalities. On the frontend, I was responsible for implementing the designs using modern HTML and CSS. As a dedicated team player, I also regularly supported my colleagues in solving problems to drive our collective progress forward.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
join.popup: In the 'Join' project, I took on a versatile role. My primary focus was the development of the contact management feature, where I implemented the functions for creating and editing users. Additionally, I designed the 'Summary' view, which serves as the central overview page. Beyond that, I was deeply involved in the frontend development and supported the team in implementing the designs with HTML and CSS. I also made significant contributions to the core components of the application, such as the drag-and-drop board and the 'Add Task' dialog, and assisted in their finalization.

elPolloLoco.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pedro find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.
elPolloLoco.popup: I built this game from scratch, taking full ownership of the concept, mechanics, level design, and enemy AI. My primary goal was to deliver a seamless and fluid gameplay experience.
